Text: M Day suggestions re Draft stipulation and talking points Cc sending this from my home computer In response to Jims email on Sunday I have drafted the attached stipulation outline and talking points to help focus the discussion on Monday morning Please contact me at the office with comments or additional content as early as possible on Monday I hope to be in the office by am Mike Day PX credit stipulation and talking points doc
